title: Front-end Developer
description: Create interactive and responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Back-end Developer
description: Build server-side applications and APIs using technologies like Node.js, Python, or Ruby.

title: Full-stack Developer
description: Develop both front-end and back-end of web applications for a seamless user experience.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces to enhance the user experience.

title: Web Developer Intern
description: Gain hands-on experience and learn web development through an internship program.

title: WordPress Developer
description: Specialize in developing websites and plugins using the WordPress platform.
